Class Encounter

java.lang.Object
  Encounter

public class Encounter
extends java.lang.Object

This class determines what will happen to the Player. Player has 3 encounters: battling, engaging a NPCTrainer (based on bender type) and engaging NPCRebel. Their is an equal chance for all the results.

Constructor Summary
Encounter()
          Default constructor
 
Method Summary
 void randomEncounter(Player h, Travel travel)
          Random encounter: battle and NPC (NPCTrainer and NPCRebel) There is not an equal chance to meet each encounter.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

Encounter

public Encounter()
Default constructor

Method Detail

randomEncounter

public void randomEncounter(Player h,
                            Travel travel)
Random encounter: battle and NPC (NPCTrainer and NPCRebel) There is not an equal chance to meet each encounter. Battles occur around 67% of the time, NPCTrainer: 12.5%, NPCHealer: 8%, NPCRebel: 8%, NPCCabbageMan: 5%
